attributes.action:
Grow understanding of the Youth Sector 
Increase funding 
Increase recruitment
attributes.additional_details: The North East Youth Alliance campaign #YouthStartsHere centres around shining the light on the sector & the work it does to enable young people to develop holistically so that they can find their voice, influence & place in society. Youth work is already saving the government £3.2bn a year through improved education/employment outcomes AND positive impacts on mental health. It is also contributing £5.7bn annually to the wider economy.With further investment, these benefits would be even higher.
attributes.background: The North East Youth Alliance wants the government to recognise the importance of the youth sector. Youth services have been cut by 73% since 2010 & annual spending has dropped by almost £1 billion. We want more funding, more recognition for our vital work & more people to work within the sector

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638630
